SEARCH
Package model.sql

Class SearchStataments

java.lang.Object
model.sql.SearchStataments
public class SearchStataments extends Object
Collection of strings to be passed to jdbc sql Statement/PreparedStatement for selecting and searching the db.

Design is inconsistent in that some strings and it's users use sql parameters '?' some use str concatenation later and others use java parameters (builders). Future enh. is to have one consistent method. i.e. could use sql params everywhere but would require in-code separation and use of db column identifiers in java e.g. SQL="...WHERE ? LIKE ? "; setString(0,"flight_id"); // db column hard string setInt(1,valueToSearch); // in-code int valueToSearcg

Author:
23751662
